title: 3 amazing ASX ETFs to buy before it too late
description: Let's see why these amazing ASX ETFs could be among the best out there and worthy of a spot in balanced portfolios...

With exchange traded funds ( [ETFs](https://www.fool.com.au/definitions/exchange-traded-fund/)) growing in popularity, there's no shortage of options out there for investors.

Three amazing ASX ETFs that could be worth getting better acquainted with are named below. Here's what they offer investors:

## **Betashares Asia Technology Tigers ETF**( [ASX: ASIA](https://www.fool.com.au/tickers/asx-asia/))

The first ASX ETF that could be a buy is the Betashares Asia Technology Tigers ETF.

This fund provides investors with access to the leading [technology stocks](https://www.fool.com.au/investing-education/technology/) across Asia, which is a region where digital adoption is still evolving rather than fully mature. Its holdings include companies such as **Tencent Holdings** ( [SEHK: 700](https://www.fool.com.au/tickers/sehk-700/)), **Alibaba** ( [NYSE: BABA](https://www.fool.com.au/tickers/nyse-baba/)), and **Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing** ( [NYSE: TSM](https://www.fool.com.au/tickers/nyse-tsm/)), which sit at the heart of gaming, digital services, and advanced chip manufacturing.
